forbidden.name: not-to-test
forbidden.comment: Don't allow dependencies from outside the test folder to test

forbidden.name: not-to-spec
forbidden.comment: Don't allow dependencies to (typescript/ javascript/ coffeescript) spec files

forbidden.name: no-circular
forbidden.comment: Warn in case there's circular dependencies

forbidden.name: no-orphans
forbidden.comment: Inform in case there's orphans hiding in the code base

forbidden.name: no-deprecated-core
forbidden.comment: Warn about dependencies on deprecated core modules.

forbidden.name: no-deprecated-npm
forbidden.comment: These npm modules are deprecated - find an alternative.

forbidden.name: not-to-unresolvable
forbidden.comment: Don't allow dependencies on modules dependency-cruiser can't resolve to files on disk (which probably means they don't exist)

forbidden.name: not-to-dev-dep
forbidden.comment: Don't allow dependencies from src/app/lib to a development only package

forbidden.name: no-non-package-json
forbidden.comment: Don't allow dependencies to packages not in package.json (except from within node_modules)

forbidden.name: optional-deps-used
forbidden.comment: nothing serious - but just check you have some serious try/ catches around the import/ requires of these

forbidden.name: peer-deps-used
forbidden.comment: Warn about the use of a peer dependency (peer dependencies are deprecated with the advent of npm 3 - and probably gone with version 4).

forbidden.name: no-duplicate-dep-types
forbidden.comment: Warn if a dependency you're actually using occurs in your package.json more than once (technically: has more than one dependency type)
